headline: Travelers Companies (TRV) Surge as Insurance Stocks Roar – Jim Cramer Says ‘They Can Go Much Higher!’
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Highlighted 12 Stocks and Tariff Panic. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Travelers Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TRV) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer highlighted. On Monday, Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, discussed the current market and he identified […]
